definitions.definition: The act of pouring a liquid , most often wine , in sacrifice on the ground, on a ritual object, or on a victim , in honor of some deity .
The wine or liquid thus poured out.
A beverage , especially an alcoholic one.

main_definition: The act of pouring a liquid , most often wine , in sacrifice on the ground, on a ritual object, or on a victim , in honor of some deity .
secondary_definitions: The wine or liquid thus poured out.
( often humorous ) A beverage , especially an alcoholic one.
